Settings in PyOfWave Server¶

This file documents all the values in SETTINGS.py, PREFERENCES.py, and __init__.py you can customise.

SETTINGS.py¶

It is highly recommended to set these settings, or PyOfWave may not function correct in your setup.

DOMAIN¶

This value represents your domain name. This is used by the protocols to identify documents and users belonging to you. Should be a string.

DELTA_OBSERVER_PROCESSES¶

The number of processes to launch to handle changes in documents “deltas”. Should be a integer.

DELTA_OBSERVER_TIMEOUT¶

The number of tasks a process should run before it times out. Should be a integer.

PREFERENCES.py¶

If you wish to customize how data is handled in PyOfWave, use this file. If you need more details, please see Using PyOfWave’s Core module.

Note

This file is seperate to handle seperate dependancies (Python yells if I have both settings using the objects and used by the objects in the core server).

STORAGE_OBJECT¶

The main storage object used by all protocols and extensions.

__init__.py¶

In this file, you setup any changes to the protocols you have in your runtime. Instructions for doing this can be found at Adding New Protocols to the PyOfWave Server.
